question: My due date was December 15 and on November 23 i was 36 weeks and 6 days it was around 10pm my husband and i had sex and after that i started feeling menstrual cramps my body felt very uncomfortable they weren't strong contractions they we're bearable around midnight i knew something was not right i told my husband to take me to labor and delivery we got there around 12:20am and they monitored me and checked my cervix i was at 4cm dilated one hour later they checked me again i was almost 5cm they decided to admit me my pain wasn't really bad the doctor asked if i was going to want the epidural and i said yes thinking i would get it when my contractions were really bad but no 15 min later the doctor came in and gave me my epidural around 3am my water broke and at 4:15 i called the nurse and told her i felt alot of pressure down there she came in checked me i was fully dilated and ready to push i started pushing at 4:30 and at 4:54am i had my BEAUTIFUL baby girl Caylee Ariana weighing 7lbs 4oz and 19.5 in. Long i had her exactly at 37 weeks she is my second daughter and i had gestational diabetes i didn't think my labor would be this fast and very peaceful and very nice such a great experience good luck to all the mommies due any day now Happy Holidays!:)
title: My labor story
